title: Understanding Repetitive Play
text: Repetitive play often involves doing the same activity over and over again, sometimes with a strong focus on specific details.

title: Observing Benjamin's Behavior
text: Consider how Benjamin reacts when the beans fall on the floor. Does this reaction indicate a repetitive or focused behavior?

hintAnswer: being very upset that beans are on the floor
title: Identifying the Key Behavior
text: What specific action does Benjamin take when the beans fall on the floor?
choices: being very upset that beans are on the floor
